name: Habit
responsibilities: Knows what days of the week it should occur
Has a title, reason and start date
Can get the detail of its habit event

name: Doer
responsibilities: can add a habit with all the details
can view a given habit and its details
can edit the details of their habit
can delete a habit of theirs
see what habits they need to do today
can see a list of all their habits
can denote a habit event when they have done a habit as planned
can view a given habit event and all its available details
can edit the details of a habit event of theirs
can delete a habit event of mine
can be uniquely identifiable in the system
can ask another doer to follow all their habits
can grant or deny another doer permission to follow all their habits
can view the habits and visual indicators of the other doers they are granted to follow

name: Habit Event
responsibilities: belongs to a habit
has an optional comment of up to 20 characters
has an optional photograph to record what happened
has an optional location to record where it happened

name: Habit Tracker
responsibilities: A list of all habits for doer.
User can add/delete habits through it
Can get what habits they need to do today
Can display the progress of habits
*Has a visual indicator to show how closely the doer is following its plan over time
